description:
Critical Reading > Sentence Completions

Choose the word or set of words that, when inserted in the sentence, best fits the meaning of the sentence as a whole.

The store manager was ------- when sales dropped for the third year in a row; that was why she ------- our department for its lack of effort.

(A) indolent . . intimidated

(B) indignant . . upbraided

(C) insolent . . exonerated

(D) indulgent . . castigated

(E) intolerant . . condoned 

正确答案>>>

点击查看第二页

title: SAT I 一日一问：2014年2月11日

description:
2014雅思阅读趋势分析&备考方案
时间：2月18日（星期二）19:00 - 20:30
主讲老师：Echo老师（点击关注老师部落主页>>>）
公开课地点：留学大厅（点击下载CCTalk>>>）

（本公开课只有注册用户才能参与，花5秒钟完成注册吧>>>）

马年到，烤鸭们能顺利马上冲刺雅思高分吗？
剑桥大学考试委员会出版的《雅思考试官方指南》即将面市，2014年第一季度的的雅思题型又有怎样的变化呢？尤其是中国考生一向自信的雅思阅读题型的变化趋势如何？如何应对这种最新的变化呢？

沪江网校资深留学教师Echo细致分析了2014年1月和2月的阅读题后，并将结合《雅思考试官方指南》为大家解析阅读题型的变化趋势和如何备考。

【老师简介】

Love English！Love IELTS！ Love Literature！ Love Plants！Love Painting！我就是博爱的Echo老师，当然最爱的还是可爱的同学们！
网校课程：
《新版雅思6.5-学术类》、《雅思口语实战模拟》、《SAT备考课程》；公开课：《英美文学之现代回声》系列；雅思口语攻略系列；

【公开课大纲】

1. 2014年1、2月雅思阅读机经；
2. 2014年雅思阅读题型变化；
3. 备考策略和阶段性方案。

零起点，扎实学！零基础直达雅思6.5【随到随学】>>
听说读写手到擒来！零基础直达雅思6分【随到随学】>>

本次课程完全免费，您需要做的就是：下载沪江全新语音学习软件--CCtalk>>点击下载

请注意！参与本活动须使用沪江全新语音学习软件CCTalk，使用指南如下：

1. 注册沪江网获得用户名（已是沪江用户的不必注册）；
2. 点击网址http://class.hujiang.com/zt/cctalk/下载CCtalk软件；
3. 软件安装结束后，输入沪江网的用户名和密码登陆CCtalk；
4. 点击下图中用红圈标注的“学习中心”；

5. 找到“留学大厅”位置，点击进入；

6. 讲座期间进入留学大厅后，如果想发言，请点击下图中的“举手”（蓝色按钮），被主持人选中后就可以发言。说话的时候可以看到麦克进度条在随麦克声音发生变化，别人说话也可以看到耳机或扬声器的进度条在变化。

description:
沪江英乐：澳大利亚女歌手 Sia 充满魔力的声音结合 Angel Haze 的说唱，堪称珠联璧合。堕落的魔鬼穷追不舍，猛击我们最脆弱的地方。负面情绪总是反反复复汹涌袭来，我躲在黑暗的角落哭喊。此时你向我走来：“Sing with me a battle cry.”

【Sia & Angel Haze 新单《Battle Cry》】

Life's like a bed of roses, you take the thorns and you make do
Sometimes you have to hurt for the cause to be reached
But one day you'll be stronger then all that you beat
And you can say

Stopped believing in churches, I stopped believing in preachers
I realized I was a teacher, not just one of the heathens
I'm born to destroy the fallacies, stop creating believers
Start creating the leaders, tell 'em who they should follow
Nobody but themselves, especially if they hollow
Especially when they empty and death reserves for fulfillment
You the only person alive who holds the key to your healin'
So you take it and you run with it
And keep going even when your suns hidden
Because the time we spend in darkness when the rain comes
Is where we often find the light soon as the pain's done
There ain't material things in the world
That can change the fact that you feel lonely
Despite the fact that it gets hard, you take it all and you still go
Take the sun and you still grow, lose the light and you still glow
I been there, I'm still here and I know how you feel, so

Money cannot buy
All the love that's here tonight
All the love that's here tonight
Ouh-ouh
It's just you and I
So lift your hands toward the sky

[Angel Haze]

That anybody not different fighting to stay the same
I got lives in my hands and I'm fighting to make 'em change
Couldn't accept responsibility, find somebody to blame
The emotions that I'm harboring 'bout to drive me insane
Tried to say fuck everything, but I ain't have the heart to
Rarely had the heart to do a lot of things I ought to
So now I spit it for people who say their cords missing
Inspire life into anybody that's forfeiting
Cause it's easy to keep pretending that there's nothing wrong
But it's harder to keep their head up and be fucking strong
So, now they telling me "go, Haze, they can't stop you
Heavyweight flow, if they can't lift you then they can't drop you
The pinnacle, if they can't reach you then they can't top you
Man, they can't do anything that you're about to"

title: Sia & Angel Haze 新单

description:
Caroline and Tyler’s relationship is the talk of the town lately, as is her “moment in the woods” with Klaus.在Caroline和Klaus去树林里滚床单之前，她和Tyler的恋情已经告吹。

Fans have a lot of questions about Caroline’s love life in general, and TV Guide asks a lot of them for us. Candice answers questions about Klaus, Stefan and whether or not she thinks Tyler and Caroline’s relationship can be salvaged. Candice replies:粉丝们现在都很想知道接下来Caroline的感情路会怎么走，在接受《电视指南》杂志访问的时候，Candice回答了Caroline和Klaus和Stefan的感情发展前途，以及CT恋能否挽回。

Do I think they can come back from Caroline's time with Klaus? I don't think so. On paper, no one did anything wrong. They were broken up. No one cheated. But it's personal. When you cross those lines and those boundaries, I would find it pretty impossible to be in a relationship and then be able to come back from that.在Caroline和Klaus滚过床单之后他们还能回去吗？我觉得不可能了。表面上谁都没错，他们已经分手了，任何一方都没有偷吃。但是在个人层面来说，当你某些事做过了界，跨过了那条界限，想要重修旧好就是很难的事情了。
